# commonModes

**Type Property**

Objects added to a run loop using this value as the mode are monitored by all run loop modes that have been declared as a member of the set of “common” modes with [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopAddCommonMode(_:_:)].

## Declaration

```swift
static let commonModes: CFRunLoopMode!
```
title: commonModes
